Docs.param: JavaScript source to be executed to obtain a list of proxies to use.
Docs.summary: Executes the provided javascript source to determine a list of proxies to use for connecting to the target URL.
Docs.returns: Returns an array of objects suitable to use for connecting to .
Docs.remarks: This method serves as a convenience wrapper for M:CoreFoundation.CFNetwork.GetProxiesForAutoConfigureationScript(Foundation.NSString proxyAutoConfigurationScript, Uri targetUri).

Docs.summary: Gets a custom T:System.Net.IWebProxy suitable for use with the standard .NET web request APIs.
Docs.returns: A custom T:System.Net.IWebProxy which uses to find a suitable proxy Uri to use.
Docs.remarks: T:System.Net.WebRequest Uses this method to initialize its P:System.Net.WebRequest.Proxy property.
